title: having issue patching
body: as the imgur link above says  hte game  tells me its having issues patching ive restarted my PC and the client rebooted my modem/router    even tried just leaving it alone for 2 hours still wont patch  dont know what to do here

replies.body: Those 003 error codes mean that the client wasn't able to get a solid connection with our servers. Run through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see how you can adjust your port forwarding and flush your DNS to hopefully get a better connection.
